description:
Elise pays Well a visit to try and learn more about her fiance, but Well has been summoned away by the Royal Palace. There Well is given a mission from the king and together with Brantag and the palace magician, Armstrong, he quickly sets off to exterminate a dragon and other monsters. Elise joins in their campaign as part of the medical team, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Bullet Tour? Are You Kidding Me?!
Dangan Shucchoutte, Sore wa Nai Deshou!
Une mission ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
弾丸出張って, それはないでしょう!
